code:
# @param {String[]} words
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_number_of_string_pairs(words)
    # Create a hash to store whether the reverse of a word is present
    reverse_word_hash = {}
    words.each { |word| reverse_word_hash[word] = false }

    pairs = 0
    words.each do |word|
        reverse_word = word.reverse
        # If the reverse word is present and not yet paired
        if reverse_word_hash[reverse_word] == false && reverse_word != word
            pairs += 1
            reverse_word_hash[word] = true
            reverse_word_hash[reverse_word] = true
        end
    end

    pairs
end
